content: soo…i needed black gloves for work…because despite san diego getting hot in the day…it s still pretty cold at night…especially since i work outside -p i needed them to be mostly work appropriate but i wanted to punk/rock them up a little bit while i was thinking about how i wanted them to look the ac/double_crochet song dirty deeds done dirt cheap was playing on the radio…and i remembered that they re one of those songs famous for having misheard lyrics … in their case involving sheep so i thought what better title for punk rock gloves involving yarn - et viola as far as sizing goes if you read the pattern it explains how to obtain alternate sizes from the one shown - this pattern is copyright 2008 by nichole m verville this pattern is not to be sold except with permission from me you may sell the finished product of this pattern as long as i am credited for the pattern you may use this pattern for personal use as long as i am credited for the pattern
